nodes.text: Doughnuts were a type of foodstuff eaten as a treat. Doughnut dispenser droids could serve doughnuts, and were found in Ashton Stadium on the Wheel.
Doughnuts first appeared in the canon junior novel Choose Your Destiny: An Obi-Wan & Anakin Adventure, which was written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019.

Doughnuts also appear in the non-canon picture book Rey and Pals, by Jeffrey Brown. When Luke Skywalker was hiding in his hut on Ahch-To, Chewbacca and Rey attempted to bribe him to come out with doughnuts, which he described as a "cheap move."
